response.overview: A guitarist of lower class musical troupe fails to get a job owing to his humble guitar. One day, he earns as much as 83,000 won, and is pleased to go back to his home. On the way to home, he helps Ok-Hee and her mother. But, Ok-Hee's mother steals the money and flees. On the following day, Ok-Hee asks him to return her mother. He and Ok-Hee take a trip here and there, and share sorrow and pleasure with some isolated persons. Ok-Hee steadily forgets the image of her mother who committed wrong things. Instead, Ok-Hee imagines good shape of her mother, which becomes her dream and life objective. In their journey up to the island Jukdo, Ok-Hee discovers that only her mother's light pink colored skirt is left.
response.title: Light Pink Coloured Skirt
